short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitCommits is a platform that brings Product Owners, Software Developers, and End Users together like never before.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As a Product Owner, you can add a bounty to Git issues, providing a monetary incentive for Developers to resolve the issue for you as quickly as possible. As an End User, you can contribute towards Product Owner bounties to increase the total bounty amount. This will increase the value to make it more appealing to "bounty hunters" so that features you are waiting on can be completed more quickly. As a Developer, you can go bounty hunting in the GitCommits Issue Browser to find issues you can resolve. When your pull request is merged, you are paid the bounty instantly! Not finding anything readily available in the Issue Browser that fits your skill level and provides a large enough bounty? Make an offer! Using this extension you can "make an offer" to resolve the specific issue at the bounty price that you specify. The Product Owner can accept, decline, or counter your offer. Counter offers may continue until a price is agreed upon, and you may begin work to claim that bounty!
